title: Save up for a lot of therapy before you enter this college if you ever have a history of mental illnesses

comments.body:
>The college is complete shite anyways

What.???? I thought PES **bhest** college🤡
First year?? Better save up a lot for therapy for the remaining years🙂.
If you are in first year, all the best in saving for therapy, for 3.5 more years 👍
